body:
### Hi there! I'm Shruti.
I'm a software developer based in New York City, and a Computer Science student at Columbia University. I presently do web and software development for Texcellent and ISKCON. You can learn more about me from my [LinkedIn profile](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=96619882).

### What do you code?
A few of my projects:  [Purvu](http://shruti108.github.com/Purvu/), [inBetween](http://shruti108.github.com/inBetween/), [GETServer](http://shruti108.github.com/GETServer), [SudokuSolver](http://shruti108.github.com/SudokuSolver), [GeoFlag](http://shruti108.github.com/GeoFlag), [saveText](http://shruti108.github.com/saveText)

You can check out more of what I'm doing on my [Github profile](http://github.com/shruti108).

### Let's get in touch!
Sure, anytime. Email: sgk2118 (at) columbia (dot) edu
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Shruti Kulkarni
